Title: Dedicates a portion of the state highway system in the town of Haverstraw, county of Rockland to "Hector L. Soto"
Summary: Dedicates a portion of the state highway system in the town of Haverstraw, county of Rockland to "Hector L. Soto."
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to dedicating a portion of the state highway system to "Hector L. Soto"
